testcase.name: TC01 Kullanici sitede surf yapabilmeli
testcase.system-out: Given Kullanici "webdriveruniversityUrl" sitesine gider.....................passed Then Login Portal a kadar iner..............................................passed And Login Portal'a tiklar...................................................passed And Diger windowa gecer.....................................................passed And username ve password kutularina deger yazdirir..........................passed And login butonuna basar....................................................passed And Popup'ta cikan yazinin -validation failed- oldugunu test edin...........passed Then Ok tusuna basar ve Popup'i kapatir.....................................passed And ilk sayfaya geri doner..................................................passed When ilk sayfaya donuldugunu test eder......................................passed And tum sayfalari kapatir...................................................passed
